name: ImageJ threshold percentile
title: ImageJ threshold percentile
description: This plugin assumes the fraction of foreground pixels to be 0.5.
author: Nick Schaub (nick.schaub@nih.gov), Anjali Taneja, Benjamin Houghton (benjamin.houghton@axleinfo.com)
institution: National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences, National Institutes of Health
citation: Doyle, W. (1962). Operations Useful for Similarity-Invariant Pattern Recognition. Journal of the ACM, 9(2), 259-267. doi:10.1145/321119.321123

inputs.description: Collection to be processed by this plugin
